description: This Conversation provides answers to questions about the SMS feature of Voice Gateway for Watson.

next_step.dialog_node: where are the docs
would you like to know more

values: When acting as Customer initiates SMS sessions, The SMS agent can also operate independently if you enable customers to contact the SMS agent directly in the configuration. In this scenario, the SMS agent provides assistance without any human intervention. This approach is beneficial for customers who prefer to interact over SMS messages rather than voice calls, such as when they have a quick question. Do you have any more questions about this feature of voice gateway?

When acting as a Contact center agent initiates SMS sessions: In this scenario, the SMS agent plays a supporting role to a telephone-based contact center. In a typical environment, a contact center agent that is assisting a customer over the phone can start an SMS session and hand the customer over to the SMS agent. From there, the SMS agent can further assist the customer. By offloading some customer interaction to the SMS agent, the contact center can handle increased call volumes. When acting as a Customer initiates SMS sessions: The SMS agent can also operate independently if you enable customers to contact the SMS agent directly in the configuration. In this scenario, the SMS agent provides assistance without any human intervention. This approach is beneficial for customers who prefer to interact over SMS messages rather than voice calls, such as when they have a quick question. Do you have any more questions about this feature of voice gateway?

When a Contact center agent initiates an SMS session,  the SMS agent plays a supporting role to a telephone-based contact center. In a typical environment, a contact center agent that is assisting a customer over the phone can start an SMS session and hand the customer over to the SMS agent. From there, the SMS agent can further assist the customer. By offloading some customer interaction to the SMS agent, the contact center can handle increased call volumes. Do you have any more questions about this feature in voice gateway?
OK.

next_step.dialog_node: end call

values: Great! ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: it was great to chat with you about the sms feature of voice gateway! Goodbye
OK ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: The SMS message you send is fed into the Watson Assistant service which, having been previously trained with typical intents and dialogs, can be used to figure out a meaningful reply to your question.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: Ok ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: OK ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: Hi, my name is Watson and I am excited to chat with you about the new SMS feature of Voice Gateway, and how it lets me chat over the phone! What would you like to know about this exciting new capability? You can ask me questions like usecases,  prerequisits, documentation, etc.
I'm sorry I did not understand your response - would you like to know more details about the use cases?

The SMS feature of Voice Gateway supports two broad use cases. The first is Contact center agent initiated SMS sessions. The second is Customer initiated SMS sessions. Would you like to know more about the Contact center agent initiated SMS sessions, the Customer initiated SMS sessions, or both? Please respond with contact or customer or both.
Ok ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: I'm sorry, We have not recieved any response . The chat session will end now.

The SMS feature of voice gateway is a new solution that allows you to connect the SMS telephone network to various Watson services in the IBM Cloud. For the first release we have built in functionality to support two main use cases - would you like me to go into more detail about the use cases?
I'm sorry, I do not understand your question. My responses are limited to the IBM SMS Gateway.
OK ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: The SMS feature of Voice Gateway is architected as an independent scalable micro service. To be able to deploy this micro service you need a Docker environment such as IBM Cloud private. This can either be on premises or in a cloud of your choosing. Note that although the Voice Gateway can be run in either location, the Watson Assistant service which it communicates with is only available in the IBM cloud. Would you like to know more?

dialog_nodes.title: Running locations

values: While the Voice and SMS gateway can run either on premises or in the cloud. Would you like more details about the environment the voice gateway needs to run in?

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: What else is needed to make the voice gateway run

values: I can answer many different questions - the limits on this are being able to determine the difference between similar questions, and the amount of time spent building my conversation service to support multiple questions such as usecase scenarios, documentation, pricing, capacity, runtime environment, contacts, etc.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: I'm sorry, We have not received any response . The chat session will end now.

The IBM Cloud, previously known as Bluemix, is the IBM's cloud platform, which runs a variety of different services and application frameworks. You can easily add these services to other services and applications, to build powerful solutions.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: The entire solution is created using a combination of IBM Watson services, as well as the IBM Voice Gateway. The Voice/SMS Gateway component was developed by the WebSphere Application Server team, as it is built on top of WebSphere Liberty's powerful SIP capabilities.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: You can speak to your IBM sales representative, call  1-877-426-3774, or email tom.banks@uk.ibm.com or sscosta@us.ibm.com for more information.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: Docker is a virtualization technology which allows you to deploy, manage, and scale applications and services quickly an easily. Kubernetes is a variant of Docker which brings some additional capabilities. The voice gateway is designed to be deployed in these environments to make it easy to deploy and manage ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.title: Where are you running right now

values: The Voice/SMS Gateway you are using now is currently based in the IBM Cloud, more specifically the Dallas datacenter. The Watson services are also running in this datacenter ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Where are you running right now

dialog_nodes.title: would you like to know more

values: What else would you like to know about the new SMS Gateway feature?

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: For pricing information, please contact your IBM sales representative, call  1-877-426-3774, or email tom.banks@uk.ibm.com or sscosta@us.ibm.com for more information.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.title: end chat

values: Hope this information was of help to you. May I end this chat?

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.title: What else is needed to make the sms feature run

values: In addition to the SMS gateway itself, you will also need a Docker environment in which you will need to deploy the SMS gateway, as well as the Watson Assistant service in the IBM Cloud and a phone number which supports SMS capability from your chosen SMS Provider.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: What else is needed to make the voice gateway run

values: Sure ...

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more
would you like to know more

values: The Watson Assistant service is used to reply back to you. Would you like more details on how I use this service?

dialog_nodes.title: capacityquestion

values: The SMS gateway can handle multiple chat sessions at the same time. The limit to what it can handle is based on the number of CPU cores it is running on and the amount of available memory.

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Where are you running right now

values: The documentation for the sms feature of voice gateway is available online. You can find them here: https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS4U29/sms_gateway.html  .

next_step.dialog_node: would you like to know more

values: This conversation has a few different questions, with information on several areas such as use cases, Watson services, documentation, running environment, pricing, etc. What would you like to know?
